meanings.definition: The quality or state of being Latin.
meanings.sent1: The latinities of the architecture in the city were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: She admired the latinities of the music, recognizing the distinct rhythm and melody.

meanings.sent4: His love for Latin culture was evident in the latinities of his home decor.
meanings.sent5: The latinities of the dance performance transported the audience to a different time and place.
